API Reference#

Summary#

Classes#

pyMMF.IndexProfile(npoints, areaSize)

Class representing the refractive index profile of the fiber.

pyMMF.propagationModeSolver()

Class for solving the scalar wave equation in multimode fiber.

pyMMF.Modes()

Class to store the modes of a multimode fiber, typically returned by the solver

Helper functions#

pyMMF.estimateNumModesSI(wl, a, NA[, pola])

Returns a rough estimation of the number of propagating modes of a step index fiber.

pyMMF.estimateNumModesGRIN(wl, a, NA[, pola])

Returns a rough estimation of the number of propagating modes of a GRIN fiber.

Class methods#

IndexProfile class#

Full description here

Methods#

pyMMF.IndexProfile.initFromArray(n_array)

Initializes the index profile from a numpy array.

pyMMF.IndexProfile.initParabolicGRIN(n1, a, NA)

Initializes the refractive index profile for a parabolic GRIN fiber.

pyMMF.IndexProfile.initStepIndex(n1, a, NA)

Initializes the step index profile.

pyMMF.IndexProfile.initFromRadialFunction(nr)

Initializes the index profile from a radial function.

IndexProfile class#

Full description here

Methods#

pyMMF.propagationModeSolver.setIndexProfile(...)

Set the index profile for the MMF.

pyMMF.propagationModeSolver.setWL(wl)

Set the wavelength (in microns).

pyMMF.propagationModeSolver.setPoisson(poisson)

Set the poisson coefficient.

pyMMF.propagationModeSolver.solve([solver, ...])

Find the propagation constants and mode profile of a multimode fiber.

Modes class#

Full description here

Methods#

pyMMF.Modes.fromFile(filename)

Load the object from a file using pickle.

pyMMF.Modes.load(filename)

Load the object from a file using pickle.

pyMMF.Modes.save(filename[, save_indes_profile])

Save the object to a file using pickle.

pyMMF.Modes.sort([fn])

Sorts the modes based on the provided function fn.

pyMMF.Modes.getModeMatrix([npola, shift, angle])

Returns the matrix containing the mode profiles.

pyMMF.Modes.getEvolutionOperator([npola, ...])

Returns the evolution operator B of the fiber.

pyMMF.Modes.getPropagationMatrix(distance[, ...])

Returns the transmission matrix T for a given fiber length in the basis of the fiber modes.

pyMMF.Modes.getCurvedModes(curvature[, npola])

Calculates the curved modes of the fiber.

pyMMF.Modes.getNearDegenerate([tol])

Find the groups of near degenerate modes with a given tolerence tol given in term of propagation constant expressed in 1/micrometer unit.

pyMMF.Modes.getNearDegenerateMask([tol])

Generates a mask for near-degenerate modes based on a given tolerance value in term of propagation constant expressed in 1/micrometer unit.
